review: I born in 1977 very happy person to know this Sai baba my favorite. Recently on my birthday unfortunately I was passing baba temple a priest called me and told to have Prasad kheer. Which my mom has to make kheer on my birthday after 11 yeras of gap Sai baba gave me on my birthday love him.

First I Must Thank Manoj Kumarji His Selection of The Cast Ultimate Each and Every Actor Actress Have Performed The Role Well I Have Seen This Picture in TV Many Times When Ever I See This Picture I Feel That I am With Baba, I Once Again Thank Manoj Kumar Ji About Songs Every Songs Touched My Heart

This movie shirdi ke sai baba 1977. I like very much. I have a deep faith in shirdi sai baba. I read sai satcharitra every thursday. And I have many experiences in my own life. I don't know how is god. But for me saibaba is my baba. Whom I can share anything. I love shirdi sai baba.
I have faith in my gods only .a new God man  who was Muslim has been made popular by a deep conspiracy to distract us from our faith in our gods.This movie had  increased the devotees of sai baba.
I keep watching this movie from time to time.It has done full justice to the life story and teachings of Sai Baba .The vibration of purity is also very much there.
This movie is the best possible depiction of life of Baba, wherein the values of happy life are taught to all devotees in simple manner. My humble pranam to Sai, Om Sai Ram.

Sudhirji Dalvi has portrayed the pious image of shree baba with so much devotion, there have been many movies but this movie is the best will be the best .
Jai sai ram!
Very beautiful movie. I loved it, the whole star cast is amazing . Every person has to watch this movie.
Great movie on saibaba and the songs are awesome I am great fan if it sainath Tere hazaro haath

All Actors are great worked in this movie...Really Superb movie on biography of Saibaba I ever seen...
Om Sai Ram..!!

I like to much this movie
Sai baba is my love and life
His worshipping is aim of my life
Excellently portrayed Sri Saibaba. I forget the world watching this movie. Sudhir Dalvi looked just like Baba.
